name: Portfolio
description: An easy project that lays down the foundation for future projects. They get familiar with good coding practices for both React components and CSS.

name: Vegan restaurant
description: This project allows to further develop clean code practice in a multi page website. Also teaches to write complex JSON files to simulate data coming from an API.

name: Package tracker
description: A project where they switch from a static JSON file to a real API call to obtain and present data from a server.

name: Todo list
description: Practice Test Driven Development testing techniques on a project that every developer is familiar with, so the student focuses on learning unit testing without pressure.

name: E-Commerce
description: We move from building front end sites for consumers, to building an administrator panel of an e-commerce store, where the owner can add categories and products to sell.

name: BBQ restaurant
description: This project combines the consumer facing site of a restaurant with the admin panel of the previous project. Students will learn to reutilize components and code from previous projects.

name: Educational platform
description: A small yet complete, Learning Management System (LMS) platform that allows to create student accounts and add more full stack features.

name: Netflix clone
description: The final project to graduate from the program. It combines all the techniques mentioned in the Tech stack while taking into consideration the UI experience.
